other_tests.findings: Initially stable WBC count above 4.0 x 10^9/L; decreased to 3.7 x 10^9/L in February 2007, then to 2.5 x 10^9/L in February 2009.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Decreased further to 1.9 x 10^9/L in April 2009, followed by an increase to 3.5 x 10^9/L a week after discontinuation of clozapine, and stable at 5.9 x 10^9/L in May 2011.
